message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing. However, I'm only able to pay up to $9,500 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $11,000. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
I appreciate your confidence in the product, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer $10,500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your valuation of the item.
